definition: to gain first-hand knowledge of sth/to experience for oneself/knowledge/experience/insight
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to lower oneself to sb's level/to argue with sb less well-informed

sentences.english: No one, he claimed, had ever seen such fans before.
sentences.chinese: 還聲稱，從來沒人見識過這樣的扇子。

sentences.english: This is when a deeper wisdom can take over and offer better insights.
sentences.chinese: 這時高深的智慧就接管了一切，並給出更好的見識。

sentences.english: This one showed us why it was called saw scaled viper.
sentences.chinese: 這一次我們算是見識到什麼叫做鋸狀鱗片蝰蛇。

sentences.english: Analyze the information you've collected to identify patterns and insights.
sentences.chinese: 分析你收集的信息，來識別模式和見識。

sentences.english: You don't want to bother yourself arguing with the likes of him.
Like a gold ring in a pigs snout is a beautiful woman without discretion.
sentences.chinese: 婦女美貌而無見識，如同金環戴在豬鼻上。

sentences.english: Experience of Zhao shake day arrived the might of landmine, be determined learns to make thunder technology secretly.
sentences.chinese: 趙震天見識到了地雷的威力，決意偷學造雷技術。

sentences.english: Prince Dastan I've seen it's power with my own eyes.
sentences.chinese: 達斯坦王子“我已經明瞭我所見識到的力量有多大。

sentences.english: I am not going to lower myself to his level.
Most heroines are neither beautiful nor knowledgeable.
sentences.chinese: 大部分女主角既不漂亮也沒見識。

sentences.english: So I determined to go to Anyang to have a look for myself.
sentences.chinese: 於是我決定親自前往安陽去見識見識。

sentences.english: So I determined to go to Anyang to have a look for myself.
sentences.chinese: 於是我決定親自前往安陽去見識見識。

sentences.english: Earlier on we had the incredible hulk dog, Wendy the Whippet.
sentences.chinese: 早先，我們見識了難以置信的巨型狗小靈狗溫迪。

sentences.english: Garfield: Show me a good mouser , and I'll show you a cat with bad breath.
sentences.chinese: 給我一隻抓耗子的貓，我就讓你見識一下他的口臭。

sentences.english: I want to see for myself.
Like a gold ring in a pig's snout is a beautiful woman without good sense.
sentences.chinese: 婦人美貌而無見識，如同金環戴在豬鼻上。

definition: to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
